metadata.title: CVE-2022-1249 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in pesign's cms_set_pw_data() function of the cms_common.c file. The function fails to handle the NULL pwdata invocation from daemon.c, which leads to an explicit NULL dereference and crash on all attempts to daemonize pesign.

criterions.comment: pesign package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
